title: Unique POV
review: This film creatively explores the women's point of view during the Vietnam War. The audience will experience the sacrifices made by these soldiers as well as relate to the mothers, wives and girlfriends left behind.

title: Evocative and moving
review: This film has such a wonderful sense of period detail. It really makes you feel that you are there, sharing the anguish of the women left behind when their men go off to Vietnam. Absorbing and poignant. Recommended.

title: Great Film about the Vietnam Era
review: This film is a really good depiction of a tumultuous and polarizing time on our country's history. The film really captures the feeling of division racially and politically that tore the country apart. Very strong narrative kept the story compelling through to the end. Great acting, cinematography costume design!
